name: @akilli/editor
description: A HTML standards-compliant and dependency-free rich text editor
author: Ayhan Akilli

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:font && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.release:patch: npm ci && npm run lint:check && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm ci && npm run lint:check && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm ci && npm run lint:check && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist
